Text:
Great films, great job, Brego!
I downloaded quite a lot of them! Specially the classic ones.

Please seed the following films:
- Casa d'appuntamento
- Your's forever
- A Girl & He
- Decadence 1988
- The Man The Myth
- The Bad Meetings

Thanks in advance.
@fonehead    If all these movies are unseeded and old too then i might have to re release them

Brego,

Most of them are old(er), yes. I donât know exactly know how it works, but it is not possible to, sort of, reseed them again? Apparently I am not the only one who is interested. A few of them get stuck at 99% or so. If this is not possible, you would do me a great favour to release them again.
Thanks.
